title: verify.receipt
description: Receipt schema for commercial verification of a payment, invoice, or settlement against a provider’s canonical view.

target.description: The identifier that was verified (transaction ID, invoice ID, payout ID, etc.).

verified.description: Whether the provider’s canonical record matches the caller’s expectations.

status.description: Provider’s canonical status for this object.

amount.description: Canonical amount/asset as seen by the provider.

settlement.description: Canonical settlement destination as seen by the provider.

reason.description: Optional explanation when verified = false or status != 'success'.

metadata.description: Optional provider- or runtime-specific additional context.

usage.description: Optional resource usage metrics (tokens, compute units, etc.).
